name: TerraSphere (Zoey Reyes)
description:
TerraSphere is a farming simulator game where you have landed on a planet in the far reaches of space and terraform the surface to bring life to the cold and quiet world. 

Played with an Xbox 360 controller.

Developed by Super Cool Dudes LLC

https://twitter.com/TerraSphereGame

Gameplay Programmer - Calvin Oh

Systems Programmmer - Pedro A. Tresgallo

Environment and Prop Art - Victoria Zeilenga

Character Art - Maddy Smith

Gameplay Designer - Jiening Tao

UI/UX and Narrative Designer - Zoey Reyes

Sound Designer - Cole Krueger

Dylan Love - Composer

Marlon Lang - Composer
